thread.title: Announcement Regarding Daylight Savings TimeTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Announcement Regarding Daylight Savings TimeTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Announcement Regarding Daylight Savings Time  
The change to Daylight Savings Time, previously planned to take place on Sunday 25 October 2015, has been postponed to 8 November 2015 due to a decision (reference number: 2015/8111) taken by the Turkish Cabinet as announced in Turkey’s National Gazette number 29492, dated 4 October 2015.
Following this change, flight timings for all our domestic flights departing from and arriving in Turkey between 25 October 2015 and 8 November 2015 will depart one hour later than the scheduled departure time in Pegasus’ summer schedule published in Turkish time, GMT +2.
There will be no changes affecting the departure and arrival times of our international flight schedules for our flights outside of Turkey.
For Instance:
Departure Flights:
Previous: Departure: İstanbul 10:00 Arrival: Antalya 11:00
New Time Plan: Departure: İstanbul 11:00 Arrival: Antalya 12:00
International Flights
Previous: Departure: İstanbul 10:00 Arrival: Zürih 12:00
New Time Plan: Departure: İstanbul 11:00 Arrival: Zürih 12:00
Yurt dışı Departurelı uçuşlar için
Previous: Departure: Londra 10:00 Arrival:İstanbul 12:00
New Time Plan: Departure: İLondra 10:00 Arrival: İstanbul 13:00
Source:- Pegasus Airlines
